name: ... Or Not To Bee
description:
This is a little entry into the /r/SoloDevelopment game jam with the theme "Minimalism". Everything is made by me.

  • Movement: Arrow keys/WSAD/left analog stick

There are 6 perks (I didn't have time for more :< ). I'll let you figure out what they are and what they do :)

If you get janky audio, try refreshing the page.
